name: Advanced Research/Reading Course (formerly WDW450H1)
description: A supervised individual or group project under the direction of a faculty member from the Centre for Criminology & Sociolegal Studies. Approval of the Undergraduate Coordinator is required.  Form is available on the Program Office website. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
department: Centre for Criminology and Sociolegal Studies
prerequisites: 3 CRI 300 half-credit lecture/seminar courses and minimum 3.0 CGPA.
